description:
Enjoy the great outdoors, without feeding the great outdoors. This bundle includes a soap bar, shower gel, and insect repellant, providing you and the family with the complete citronella experience.

  • Deet-free bug spray ingredients: citronella, terpene, tea tree essential oil, organic rosemary, thyme, basil, geranium, and patchouli
  • Bug spray is effective against mosquitoes, biting ﬂies and deer ticks, without the using synthetic ingredients
  • Certified organic shower gel doubles as a shampoo and bodywash
  • Soap bar formulated with essential oils
  • Products are gentle on sensitive skin
name: Druide Citronella Adventure Kit

specs.key: Suitable for use in salt water
